meta.description: Zoni AI is an activity app to learn interactively for students, which is open source and free to use
meta.title: Home

index_page.stats: There are already {{user_count}} users and {{quiz_count}} activities on Zoni AI.
index_page.see_what_true_and_false: See what was right or wrong
index_page.see_how_many_true_and_false: See how many were right or wrong
index_page.create_a_quiz_from_scratch: Create an activity from scratch with the editor and include pictures and more
index_page.find_or_explore: Find (or explore) activities made or imported by other people
index_page.check_if_chosen_wisely: Check, if you have chosen wisely
index_page.get_ranking_and_winners: Get the ranking and see who won
index_page.no_tracking_content: Others track you and sends that info to third-parties, but Zoni AI doesn't.
index_page.self_hostable_content: Zoni AI can easily be self-hosted, so the data is only in your control!
index_page.user_friendly_content: Zoni AI aims to be simple, so it is can be used by everyone.
index_page.completely_free_content: Zoni AI is completely cost free (for the user), without any paid plans or annoying redirects to the upgrade-page. Donations are highly appreciated.
index_page.quiz_results_downloadable_content: Activity-results can be easily exported into an Excel-spreadsheet. (Didn't know others couldn't do that)
index_page.multilingual_content: Zoni AI is available in English, French, German, Italian, Norwegian Bokmål, Turkish, and partly Indonesian and Catalan.
index_page.dark_mode_content: One of the most important features a website can have!
index_page.german_server_content: Zoni AI's servers are located in Germany and hosted by netcup.
index_page.download_quizzes_content: Activities can be downloaded as one file and imported at any time. This also lets you move your activities to other Zoni AI instances.
index_page.community_driven_content: Zoni AI depends on its community for funding, testing ideas, feature requests, translations and more! You can also be a part of the Zoni AI community!
index_page.how_does_classquiz_work: How does Zoni AI even work?
index_page.no_player_limit_content: Zoni AI doesn't have an artificial participant limit. In theory, 1000+ participant could play the same activity, but it's tested with up to 300 participants per activity.

overview_page.no_quizzes: Click the "Create"-button, or import an activity to get going.

login_page.login_or_create_account: Log in or create an account

success.success_check_mail: Logged in. Check your e-mail inbox.

description.success_check_mail: Please check your e-mail inbox for an e-mail with a link you can click to log in.

description.wrong_creds: Please ensure your password and e-mail address are correct.
description.unexpected: There was the good old unexpected error!

words.question: Question
words.title: Title
words.name: Name
words.you_need_to_be_logged_in_to_start_a_game: You need to be logged in to start an activity
words.you_need_to_be_logged_in_to_download_a_g: You need to be logged in to download an activity
words.you_need_to_be_logged_in_to_start_a_prac: You need to be logged in to start a practice
words.qr_code_to_join_the_game: QR code to join the activity

editor.abcd_description: Only one answer can be chosen
editor.voting_description: Multiple-choice, but there are no points if an answer is correct
editor.check_choice_description: All correct answers have to be chosen to score points
editor.order_description: Answers can be brought into the correct order
editor.range_description: A number-range can be selected with a slider

import_page.url_should_look_like_this: The URL should look like this: https://create.kahoot.it/details/...
import_page.side_import_kahoot: On this side, you can import activities that are available on Kahoot!
import_page.upload_file_ending: Upload the file ending in .cqa or .xlsx
import_page.this_side_classquiz: On this side you can import activities, which were exported from Zoni AI.
import_page.this_side_classquiz_excel: You can also upload Excel files if you've filled out the following template. If an activity with the same title already exists, it will append the questions to the existing activity.

admin_page.already_registered_as_admin: There is already an admin registered for this activity.
admin_page.start_by_showing_first_question: Start by showing the first question.
admin_page.enter_answer_into_field: Enter your answer into the input field!

play_page.end_sentence: That's it! This was the activity.
play_page.join_description: Please use your phone camera to scan the QR code or visit {{url}} and enter the activity CODE: {{pin}}
play_page.join_by_entering_code: Join by entering the following code

editor_page.right_click_to_delete: Right-click on an answer to delete it!

dashboard.info_analytics: The "Plays" only show how often the activity was started (you included), whereas the "Views" count how often the "View"-page was visited, so it also counts bots (sorry for that).
dashboard.commandpalette_notice: Press <kbd>Ctr</kbd>+<kbd>k</kbd> or <kbd>Meta</kbd>+<kbd>k</kbd> to open the command palette

footer.self_ads: Made with ❤️ by {{mawoka_link}} and with the help of {{others_link}}.
footer.donate: If you find this useful, please consider {{donate_link}}.

error_page.404_text: The page you were looking for is gone or never even existed. Who knows?
error_page.unknown_error_text: That shouldn't happen. It's probably my fault, not yours, but maybe you have a magical power to break stuff...

uploader.upload_video_popup_notice: The popup is open; have a look at it for further information
uploader.search_english_only: The search works in English only

general_overview.sentence: The activity "{{title}}", which was started on {{date}} had {{player_count}} participants with an average score of {{average_score}}.

controllers.version_overview: The newest version available is {{newest_version}} and version {{current_version}} is installed.
controllers.already_latest_version: You're already on the latest version

totp_setup.scan_to_set_up: Scan this QR-code to set up the code
totp_setup.enter_as_secret_if_no_see_code: Enter this as the secret if you can't scan the QR-code
totp_setup.do_not_forget_backup_code: Do not forget to save your recovery-code!

start_game.captcha_message: If enabled, Google's ReCaptcha will load in the browser of participants. Only enable if you really need it, since you need the consent of EVERY participant to load the captcha.
start_game.normal_mode_description: Questions and answers will only be shown on the admin's screen. The participants will only have colored buttons with symbols matching those on the admin's screen.
start_game.old_school_mode_description: Questions and images will be shown on both the admin's screen and the screen of the participants.

public_user_page.no_original_quizzes: This user doesn't have any original activities

file_dashboard.caption: Caption: {{caption}}
file_dashboard.storage_usage: You've used {{used}} MiB out of {{total}} MiB of storage. That's equivalent to {{percent}}% of your storage.

downloader.help: The own format (.cqa) also includes pictures and supports every question type, whereas the excel format only supports voting and multiple-choice questions.
